manager.name: Match Coordinator Agent
manager.description: Orchestrates the compatibility analysis workflow, routes adopter data to sub-agents, aggregates profile analysis with animal assessments, and generates final ranked recommendations with detailed compatibility explanations

sub_agents.name: Adopter Profile Agent
sub_agents.description: Analyzes questionnaire responses to build comprehensive adopter profile including activity level, experience score, home environment rating, time availability, and lifestyle compatibility factors

sub_agents.name: Animal Compatibility Agent
sub_agents.description: Evaluates each available animal's behavioral profile, needs, and temperament against the adopter profile to calculate compatibility scores across multiple dimensions

workflow_trigger: Find My Match button on Assessment Screen

standalone_agents.name: Pet Wellness Monitor Agent
standalone_agents.description: Monitor adopted pet health and behavior through wearable data, detect anomalies, and trigger automated actions
